Basic meanings of word: (trans.) To stuff (incl with food/drink). (reflex.) To get drunk
To load, charge. (Reflexive) To take care of
To consign, to record, (school) to give detention
to correspond (+ à), to write to
To pledge, hire, involve, encourage, enlist, enter into
to leave, to allow, (reflex.) to allow oneself
To impose. (Reflexive) To triumph, to be required
To reapproach, come/bring closer. (reflexive + de) to get closer (to)
To direct, fulfill, perform, make, realise. Reflexive: to become real
to collect, gather, obtain. (reflexive) To reflect, meditate
(transitive) To deceive, trick (incl cheating on a partner). (reflexive) To make a mistake, be wrong.
